front.title: Reoptimization of Point-to-Multipoint Traffic Engineering Loosely Routed LSPs

abstract.t: This document defines Resource Reservation Protocol - Traffic Engineering (RSVP-TE) signaling extensions for reoptimizing loosely routed Point-to-Multipoint (P2MP) Traffic Engineered (TE) Label Switched Paths (LSPs) in an Multi-Protocol Label Switching (MPLS) and/or Generalized MPLS (GMPLS) networks.
